about-me.title: Let's work together!
about-me.beschreibung: I am a Front-end developer based in Stuttgart, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life.  I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position. My ability to solve complex problems and my passion for programming make me a valuable member for your team.
about-me.beschreibung-2: If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

contact.beschreibung: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.privacy-3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.name: Your name

my-work.beschreibung: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

working-examples.join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
working-examples.pokedex: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.
working-examples.elpolloloco: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

reviews.beschreibung: Hear what my colleagues said about me
reviews.review-1: ‘‘Michael is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write a clear code. I  highly recommend him as a colleague.’’
reviews.review-2: ‘‘Michael is a trustworthy teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code.’’
reviews.review-3: ‘’Michael had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members. He is a reliable and friendly person.’’
